titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Department of Government Records 1943-2007
titlestmt.subtitle: Government, Department of UA 208

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created by Eileen O'Toole, SCRC Staff, 0007

frontmatter.titlepage:
Inventory of the Department of Government Records, 1943-2007 A Collection in the
Special Collections Research Center UA 208
Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary 2012 &contact;
Processed By
Special Collections Staff.

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: This collection includes fliers, conference booklets, and newsletters from the Department of Government at the College of William and Mary.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: College of William and Mary, Dept. of Government Records, Special Collections Research Center, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: This collection was previously part of the University Archives Publications Collection.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The box and folder listing was created by Kelsey Kavanaugh, SCRC Staff, in April 2009.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Information about the Collete of William and Mary's Department of Government is available from the Special Collections Research Center's Wiki at http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Government. Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Dept. of Government.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes fliers, conference booklets, and newsletters from the Department of Government at the College of William and Mary.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

controlaccess.head: Corporate Name:
controlaccess.corpname: College of William and Mary. Dept. of Government

controlaccess.head: Topical Term:
controlaccess.subject: College of William and Mary--History--20th century.
Newsletters.
